modulo.descricao_tipo_history:
Choose what you prefer!
You can define if you want a `complete return`, or something `simplified`.

-> In the `complete return` I will show you the complete list of the day's events.
-> The `summarized return` I will show only one event, this one chosen as the most important of the day.
modulo.rodape_tipo_modulo: Which one do you prefer? Select a type below to get started!
modulo.faltando_tipo:
You have not defined whether the history module will be summarized or complete
By default, I will send you a summarized version!
modulo.descricao:
This module will discount `B$auto_repl per day`, the more modules you activate,
the more Bufunfas will be deducted from your bank per day.

Currently the value for operating your modules is `B$auto_repl per day`.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

portal.descricao:
auto_repl Your main portal needs to be mounted at the following coordinates auto_repl```fix
X: auto_repl; Z: auto_repl```
auto_repl A new portal will be created at the following coordinates when traversing to auto_repl```fix
X: auto_repl; Z: auto_repl```
:mag: | Enable coordinates by pressing F3 (in Java Edition) or in the world settings in Bedrock Edition.

:warning: | Note that the portals need to have a minimum distance between the coordinates to be linked correctly, if there are portals very close, the link between them will not work.

telemetria.descricao:
For a better functioning of Alonsal, we use several anonymized data to decide which functionalities to pay more attention and improve in the future.

This data can come from all the functions of the bot, the most important being the commands, when using a command, like this from /telemetry, the bot records the interaction in its history of commands issued and displays a short summary of which server the command was used, as shown in the print attached below.

Other data we also collect is listed below:
`Servers input and output (bot)`, `Total servers, channels and users that the bot can view`, `Errors that occur during a command`, `Text messages for experiences/level`, `Bufunfas movements`, `Channels that receive free game updates`, and finally those last ones that are updated daily:

`Commands fired, errors, experience granted, messages valid for xp, bufunfas distributed and moved, and "known" servers, channels and users.`
telemetria.rodape: 🔰 | It is worth noting that the text entries are also hidden, making the typed content not visible for your privacy.

traduz.descricao:
Help me translate and improve translations, or add new languages via the Alondioma repository!

New languages are always welcome, and the correction of some terms is essential for a good understanding and friendly use of Alonses

painel.descricao:
Control my functions using the buttons below

Green buttons are features on.
Gray buttons are features off.

Your report will add the following user to my misbehaved list.

You can decide whether I will notify other servers of this inclusion, whether I will silently add him or whether you wish to cancel this report.
report.descricao_automatizado:
Your report will add all justified users who are banned on this server to my naughty users list.

Auto-imported users are not mentioned to other servers, but are displayed in their lists with the command </verify guild:1094346210636214306>, if they are members of such.

tasks.ativo:

You'll be able to see all your lists and tasks on any server I'm on too!
tasks.desativo:
Tasks will now be shown by server, separately.
You can create lists with the same name for different servers.
